thread.title: Arsenal transfer news: Adrien Rabiot puts Gunners on alert after major revelation | Metro News
thread.title_full: Arsenal transfer news: Adrien Rabiot puts Gunners on alert after major revelation | Metro News

author: Tom Olver For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Arsenal transfer news: Adrien Rabiot puts Gunners on alert after major revelation | Metro News
text:
Follow us Arsenal on alert as Adrien Rabiot admits he’s open to offers ahead of summer transfer window Tom Olver for Metro.co.uk Sunday 26 Feb 2017 12:07 pm Arsenal are tracking PSG star Adrien Rabiot (Picture: Getty) 
Paris Saint-Germain ace Adrien Rabiot has put Arsenal on red alert after revealing that he’s open to offers ahead of the summer transfer window. Jurgen Klopp sends warning to his Liverpool flops after Leicester loss 
The 21-year-old midfielder has scored eight goals in 91 Ligue 1 appearances for PSG since making his debut for the French giants in 2012 but is being linked with a move away from the Parc des Princes at the end of the season. 
Get French Football News suggest the Gunners are monitoring Rabiot’s contract situation at PSG and the France international has welcomed interest from other clubs before the 2017/18 campaign. 
‘I am under contract until 2019 and I do not think that I am in a rush,’ he told Europe 1. Will Arsene Wenger move for Adrien Rabiot in the summer? (Picture: Getty) 
‘Honestly, I am nothing thinking about that. If there are offers from big clubs, that obviously demands that they are considered. 
‘Clubs like Real Madrid, they are great clubs but, truly, the most important thing is the present.
